resources.string: Powered by FDA MyStudies on Google Cloud
<これは、FDAによって実施されているいくつかの治験を収蔵するワンストップアプリです。利用可能な治験のリストをチェックアウトして、あなたに関連するものに参加してください。あなたの参加をお待ちしています。>

You have chosen to delete your &app_name; Account. This will result in automatic withdrawal from all studies.\n\nBelow is a list of studies that you are a part of and information on how your response data will be handled with each after you withdraw. Please review and confirm.
いAre you sure you wish to permanently delete your &app_name; Gateway app account? You will need to register again if you wish to join a study.
うIt\'s been a while since you visited the &app_name; app. Please consider continuing your participation in any studies in which you\'re enrolled.
